title: alan-chalmers--what-is-this-thing-called-science--isbn-087220453
description:
This PDF has the images of pages and invisible OCR text on top, which is nice if you want to search the text using your PDF reader and not just flip the pages erratically until you find what you want.

From http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/What_Is_This_Thing_Called_Science%3F

What Is This Thing Called Science? is a best-selling textbook by Dr. Alan Chalmers. It is a guide to the Philosophy of Science which outlines the shortcomings of a naive empiricist accounts of science, and describes and assesses modern attempts to replace them. The book is written with minimal use of technical terms.
